summary: A set of helper utilities for NeMo NLP components that facilitate model evaluation, metric visualization, and data handling. The module provides functions to generate classification reports, plot confusion matrices, map activation identifiers to callable functions, convert tensors to Python lists, manage rank information in distributed settings, and infer torch data types from precision specifications.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to efficiently assess and visualize the performance of NLP models built with the NeMo framework, while simplifying common data conversion and configuration tasks during training and inference.
